italy/bellagio.jpeg.name: Lake Como - Bellagio
italy/bellagio.jpeg.description: We found ourselves hanging out quite often by the port downtown Bellagio to watch the boats and the ducks come and go.

italy/the-streets.jpeg.name: Streets of Bellagio
italy/the-streets.jpeg.description: With two girls still in a stroller, we had a tough time going up and down the steep hills.

italy/tremezzo.jpeg.name: Grand Hotel Tremezzo
italy/tremezzo.jpeg.description: We may have snuck up to the famous clay tennis court at GHT. Definitely a core memory for me and the girls.

portugal/park.jpeg.name: Parque Infantil e de Lazer do Recolhimento
portugal/park.jpeg.description: We braved the steep streets to visit a gorgeous park, perfect for our kids to have lunch and play.

netherlands/park.jpeg.name: Johnny Jordaanplein
netherlands/park.jpeg.description: A playground in the middle of the city is definitely our vibe.

denmark/playground.jpeg.name: Playground in Ã˜rstedsparken at Ahlefeldtsgade
denmark/playground.jpeg.description: Copenhagen is so full of nature. This playground was next to an outdoor cafe in a large park. Beautiful
